desc.name: Oversees daily activity of the team.
Prepares budgets, schedules, and other organisational reports as needed.
Developed and maintaining the organization website
Collaborating with my team to come up with strategies that will help learners to complete the Scholarship.
Ensure learners can improve their skills by actively engaging with content on Pluralsight.
Empower talent in Africa through Andela learning community, Google Africa and Pluralsight resources.
Writing cross-browser compliant HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript(React).
Develop project concept and maintain optimal workflow.
Complete detailed programming and development tasks.
Collaborate with designers to create a clean interfaces.
Collaborate with other developers through web-based hosting service for version control using git.
Performed maintenance and updates to existing client Web sites.
Participated in brainstorming sessions to come up with ideas.
Documented software and technical specifications.
Addressed cross-browser compatibility issues.
Devising SEO strategies based on specific keywords.
Mentor learners on their online engagement platforms.
Make sure more than 75% learner completion of 50-75% of course contents and projects.
Make sure more than 50% learner completion of 100% of course contents and projects.
Organize and facilitate ALC meetups.
Assisting co-workers with everyday IT needs.
Making recommendations for improving the organization website.
Maintaining the organization IT network.
